name: pubmed_search
description: Search PubMed medical papers. Returns titles, authors, journals, and PMIDs.

steps.code: const results = []; document.querySelectorAll('article.full-docsum, .results-article').forEach((el, i) => { if (i < 15) { const titleEl = el.querySelector('a.docsum-title, .title a'); const authEl = el.querySelector('.docsum-authors, .authors'); const journalEl = el.querySelector('.docsum-journal-citation, .journal'); const pmidEl = el.querySelector('.docsum-pmid, .pmid'); results.push({ title: titleEl?.textContent?.trim() || '', url: titleEl?.href || '', authors: authEl?.textContent?.trim() || '', journal: journalEl?.textContent?.trim() || '', pmid: pmidEl?.textContent?.trim() || '' }); } }); return { query: '{{query}}', result_count: results.length, results };
steps.name: results
steps.label: Extract papers
